sense.def:
Extreme
pomeni zelo velik po stopnji ali moči.

seg.quote: You must proceed with extreme caution.
Ralph and I always got on extremely well.

sense.def:
Extreme
pomeni tudi zelo oster, nenavaden ali nerazumen.

seg.quote: People are capable of surviving in extreme conditions.
...the extreme Right Wing of the Party.

sense.def:
Točka ali rob, ki je
extreme
, je od nečesa najbolj oddaljen.

Kadar človek
is going to extremes
ali
is taking something to extremes
, je njegovo vedenje pretirano in nesprejemljivo.

cit.quote: iti v skrajnost, gnati do skrajnosti

sense.def:
Z izrazom
in the extreme
poudarimo, kako slabo ali nezaželeno je nekaj.

seg.quote: I thought the suggestion dangerous in the extreme.
